content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good afternoon, Hassan. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What would you like to propose?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant. However, as a landlord, I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Is that something you would be comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Hassan. I'm glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
